alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 21 at 2:34PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...Wind Advisory remains in effect... * Breezy trades of 20 to 30 mph with higher gusts will impact all islands. * TIMING...through Sunday * IMPACTS...Expect possible downed tree limbs as well as shifting of loose and unsecured small objects due to strong winds. Gusty winds will make driving difficult and may cause hazardous conditions for mariners. FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 234 AOAULI ASO TOFI SETEMA 21 2023 ...O LOO TUMAU FAUTUAGA MO SAVILI MALOLOSI... * O savili o le tuaoloa e 20 i le 30 mph ma e agi fa`ata`uta`u i taimi o le a fa`apea ona a`afia ai motu uma. * TAIMI...seia oo i le Aso Sa. * AAFIAGA...E pau`u ai laau, lelea mea totino e le`i faamaumauina ma faaleagaina ai apa ma taualuga o fale. Savili malolosi e mafai ona faafaigata ai ona faafoe taavale, ae maise lava taavale maualuluga. E sousou fo`i le sami ona o le malolosi o savili. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le fautuaga mo savili malolosi o savili e 30 i le 39 mph ma malolosi atu i taimi e agi fa`ata`uta`u ai o le a aafia ai pea le atunuu. O nei savili e malolosi atu i nofoaga maualuluga. O le a faafaigata ai fo`i ona faafoe taavale i luga o le auala tele, ae maise taavale tetele ma le maualuluga. Ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga.
info.instruction: A wind advisory means that winds of 25 to 35 mph are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
